p: To our knowledge this is the first study on the liquid and vapor phase chemical characterization of L. nobilis, S. officinalis and S. sclarea EOs and their HYs carried out by the headspace-gas-chromatography/mass-spectrometry (HS-GC/MS) technique. The antibacterial activity of EOs and HYs was also investigated by microdilution and disc diffusion methods; furthermore, DPPH and ABTS assays were performed to evaluate their antioxidant activities.
